attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
i would like to make a petition, for the rights of our soldiers  who are fighting in a war that is illegal,, should be given the right to vote on the future of our country, in the next election, Under the Representation of the People Act 2000, armed forces personnel have a choice of putting their names on the electoral roll through the Services or as civilians

Most worryingly, this raises the very troubling question of whether Gordon Brown’s government’s failure to allow democratic representation to our Armed Forces is merely down to incompetence




yours faithfully,
B,J,DEVLIN

rejection.details: Your title should be a clear call for action, preferably starting with a verb, and not a name or statement.
reasons: Statements that don't actually request any action
